title: The Data Analyst
subtitle: CSV Data Processing
description:
# CSV Data Processing

Filter, transform, and aggregate CSV data!

⚔️ Process battle statistics!
starterCode:
import csv
import io

BATTLE_LOG = '''name,damage,target,result
Warrior,45,Goblin,hit
Mage,60,Orc,hit
Rogue,35,Goblin,miss
Warrior,50,Orc,hit'''

reader = csv.DictReader(io.StringIO(BATTLE_LOG))

# TODO: Calculate total damage from successful hits
total_damage = 0
for row in reader:
    if row['result'] == 'hit':
        total_damage += int(row['damage'])

print(f'Total damage dealt: {total_damage}')
solutionCode:
import csv
import io

BATTLE_LOG = '''name,damage,target,result
Warrior,45,Goblin,hit
Mage,60,Orc,hit
Rogue,35,Goblin,miss
Warrior,50,Orc,hit'''

reader = csv.DictReader(io.StringIO(BATTLE_LOG))

total_damage = 0
for row in reader:
    if row['result'] == 'hit':
        total_damage += int(row['damage'])

print(f'Total damage dealt: {total_damage}')
hints: Convert damage to int before summing
